thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Yonghui Superstores Questioned by Shanghai Exchange Over Potential Investment In Carrefour China

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yonghui Superstores Questioned by Shanghai Exchange Over Potential Investment In Carrefour China

organizations.name: shanghai exchange over potential investment in carrefour china

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Yonghui Superstores Co Ltd:
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO HALT FROM JAN 24 AS IT IS QUESTIONED BY SHANGHAI STOCK EXCHANGE OVER ITS POTENTIAL INVESTMENT IN CARREFOUR CHINA
* SAYS SHANGHAI EXCHANGE'S INQUIRIES INCLUDING FINANCIAL DETAILS IN THE PROPOSED INVESTMENT, IMPACT ON COMPANY'S OPERATION AND BOTTOMLINES Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2F5Ss83 ; bit.ly/2DsBJLC Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
